title: How do I stop Google mini from making calls?
content:
Hi, I have a Pixel 2 phone and several Google home minis around my house. When I say "Okay Google, call Bob", the Google mini tries to place the call instead of my phone. How do I stop this from happening? I would like to disable the calling feature entirely on the speakers. Is this possible? Or can I prioritize which device makes calls?

Thanks!
category: Google Assistant and Voice Actions, Google Pixel 2
